elevator.rmi
Interface FloorButtons

All Superinterfaces:
java.rmi.Remote
All Known Implementing Classes:
FloorButtonsImpl
public interface FloorButtons
extends java.rmi.Remote

The remote interface used for adding remote action listeners via RMI interested in processing action events from floor buttons. A listener class must implement the elevator.rmi.RemoteActionListener interface.

The FloorButtons interface is implemented by the proxy class elevator.rmi.impl.FloorButtonsImpl. The getFloorButtons() static method of the elevator.rmi.MakeAll class is invoked to get a remote reference to the FloorButtons object. A proxy object with the elevator.rmi.FloorButtonsImpl class is created for adding remote action listeners to the inside buttons of elevators.

The class that is interested in processing action events from inside-elevator buttons must implement the elevator.rmi.RemoteActionListener interface, and it must either extend the java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject class or be exported by the static method java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject.exportObject(Object), as required by the Java RMI. The object created with that class is remotely registered with floor buttons using the addActionListener method of the FloorButtons interface, invoked on the FloorButtonsImpl proxy object via RMI. For example: 

 import java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject;
 import java.awt.event.*
 import elevator.rmi.*;
 ...
 public class MyListener extends UnicastRemoteObject
  implements RemoteActionListener {
     ...
     FloorButtons buttons = MakeAll.getFloorButtons();
     ...
     buttons.addActionListener((RemoteActionListener)this);
     ...
     public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent event) {
      System.out.println(event.getActionCommand());
     }
     ...
 }

Author:
Vlad Vlassov, IMIT/KTH, Stockholm, Sweden
See Also:
RemoteActionListener, ActionListener, ActionEvent, InsideButtons, FloorButtons

Method Summary
 void addActionListener(int floor, int direction, RemoteActionListener listener)
          Adds a RemoteActionListener listener to a floor button of a specified direction.
 void addActionListener(int floor, RemoteActionListener listener)
          Adds a RemoteActionListener listener to both, up and down, buttons (if any) on a specified floor.
 void addActionListener(int direction, RemoteActionListener[] listener)
          Adds RemoteActionListener listeners to up (down) buttons on all floors.

          Adds a RemoteActionListener listener to all floor buttons on all floors.
 void addActionListener(RemoteActionListener[] listener)
          Adds RemoteActionListener listeners to buttons on all floors.

Method Detail

addActionListener

public void addActionListener(int floor,
                              int direction,
                              RemoteActionListener listener)
                       throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
                              IllegalParamException
Adds a RemoteActionListener listener to a floor button of a specified direction.
Parameters:
floor - the number of the floor where the button is located.
direction - the direction (arrow up/down) of the button that is either FloorButtons.UP or FloorButtons.DOWN.
listener - the RemoteActionListener to be added
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException - if failed to execute
IllegalParamException - if the floor is not a legal floor number or the direction is not a legal button arrow direction,

addActionListener

public void addActionListener(int floor,
                              RemoteActionListener listener)
                       throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
                              IllegalParamException
Adds a RemoteActionListener listener to both, up and down, buttons (if any) on a specified floor.
Parameters:
floor - the number of the floor where the button is located.
listener - the RemoteActionListener to be added
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException - if failed to execute
IllegalParamException - if the floor is not a legal floor number

addActionListener

public void addActionListener(int direction,
                              RemoteActionListener[] listener)
                       throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
                              IllegalParamException
Adds RemoteActionListener listeners to up (down) buttons on all floors. An element of listener is added to either up or down buttons (if any) on a floor starting from bottom.
Parameters:
direction - the direction (arrow up/down) of the buttons that is either FloorButtons.UP or FloorButtons.DOWN.
listener - the array of RemoteActionListener to be added
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException - if failed to execute
IllegalParamException - if the length of listener does not match the number of floors or direction is not a legal arrow direction

addActionListener

public void addActionListener(RemoteActionListener listener)
                       throws java.rmi.RemoteException
Adds a RemoteActionListener listener to all floor buttons on all floors.
Parameters:
listener - the RemoteActionListener to be added
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException - if failed to execute

addActionListener

public void addActionListener(RemoteActionListener[] listener)
                       throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
                              IllegalParamException
Adds RemoteActionListener listeners to buttons on all floors. An element of listener is added to both, up and down, buttons (if any) on a floor starting from bottom.
Parameters:
listener - the array of RemoteActionListener to be added
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException - if failed to execute
IllegalParamException - if the length of listener does not match the number of floors
